'On Fire' is the first studio album released by Australian Christian musician
Peter Furler. It marks Furler's solo debut after his departure from Newsboys in
2009. [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXis9GeptpA YouTube - newsboys - Peter
& Tait Talk About Changes] youtube.com. Retrieved 04-20-2011. After some
date changes, the album was finally released 21 June 2011. [http://www.jesusfreakhideout.com/cdreviews/OnFire.asp
Jesusfreakhideout.com: Peter Furler, On Fire Review] jesusfreakhideout.com.
Retrieved 04-20-2011.
